product_name: REI Carbon Power Lock Trekking Poles - Pair
long_description: Offering high-performance stability and power for a variety of hiking terrains, the REI Carbon Power Lock Trekking Poles feature a lightweight design and reliable, easily adjusted locking mechanisms.
short_description: Offering high-performance stability and power for a variety of hiking terrains, the REI Carbon Power Lock Trekking Poles feature a lightweight design and reliable, easily adjusted locking mechanisms.
